title: Vampire The Masquerade: Beckett
description: .html by Mike Reynolds & Greg Scott From war-torn Europe to modern day Berlin, the vampire Beckett follows the trail of two important clues that may solve the mysteries of The Book of Nod. Hot on his tracks, however, are the unearthly sadist Sascha and Marie, a mortal Hunter whose past encounter with Beckett has turned her hatred for him into an undying obsession! Beckett, the Indiana Jones of the sleep-all-day set, is surely up for any adventure... but he will find that his temper and arrogance are his greatest foes! Mike Reynolds (Theo Bell) and Greg Scott (Marvel's Sabretooth) kick this puppy into high gear! Cover by Guy Davis and Vince Locke. MATURE READERS. FC, 48pg
author: Mike Reynolds
